author: Chris Welch
title: Webcams have become impossible to find, and prices are skyrocketing
description: Webcams from Logitech, Razer, and other companies are sold out at almost all retailers, and resellers are marking up the devices to ludicrous prices on Amazon, eBay, and Craigslist.
content:
Logitech is reporting resellers who are tacking hundreds onto webcam prices
Image: Logitech
Most laptops come with a built-in webcam, but if youre working at home from a desktop or maybe just looking to touch up the mediocre quality of whatever camera youre… [+3021 chars]
